article_title: How Big Data Will Help Save Healthcare

article_metadata.description: More and more companies are talking about big data these days—but it's more than a buzzword. It might just change the way healthcare works in the U.S. From better patient outcomes to a more transparent healthcare system to more accessible and affordable care, big data could change every inch of the nation's $3 trillion healthcare industry—all for the better.
article_metadata.author: Castlight
